title: AS-AD graph - impact of demand-pull inflation

content.question: According to the graph above and starting with equilibrium point R, which of the following shifts identifies the short-run and the long-run impact of a demand-pull inflation?

choices.label:
Short Run
 Long Run

R to N
 M to N

Short Run
 Long Run

R to M
 R to N

Short Run
 Long Run

R to Q
 Q to N

Short Run
 Long Run

R to M
 R to Q

Short Run
 Long Run

R to N

N to Q

content.answer:
Short Run
 Long Run

R to M
 R to N

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
